cues.label: Opening
cues.text: Welcome to Babulus, the AI-powered video creation platform. Create professional videos using code, with automatic voiceovers and scene composition.

cues.label: Power of TypeScript
cues.text: Babulus combines the power of TypeScript with AI to streamline video production. Write your video content as code, and we handle voiceover generation, timing, and rendering.

cues.label: Tooling Features
cues.text: Use scenes to organize your content, cues to structure narration, and beats to control timing. Add background music, sound effects, and visual components to enhance your videos.

cues.label: How to Begin
cues.text: Getting started is simple. Create a project, upload your assets, and start writing your video script. The editor provides real-time preview, syntax highlighting, and instant feedback as you build.

cues.label: Workflow
cues.text: When you are ready, click Generate to process your script and create the final video. You can iterate quickly, making changes and regenerating until your video is perfect.

cues.label: Call to Action
cues.text: Whether you are creating marketing content, educational videos, or product demos, Babulus makes it fast and easy. Start creating your first video today and experience the future of video production.
